title: Median Salary of Women Per Year
summary: This chart shows that the Median Salary for Salary Women Per Year has increased continualy since 2000 , with the average Salary for Salary Women Per Year over 50 ,000 dollars in 2015 , compared to 40 ,000 in 2000 .
gold: 2015 saw women median pay rise to 53 k , from 50 k in 2010 . 2005 it was at 45 k from 40 k in 2000 , so you can see it has been rising steadily
